sections.title: How your clients find you online
content: 44% of them will reach for a search engine for your address information.
41% of those searches will end up in an on-site visit.
2 clients out of 3 will consult the info and photos on your listing before visiting.

sections.title: Your listing is the true abc of online presence
sections.subtitle: The keyword is not the key word
sections.desc: Clients turn to search engines and social networks during the exploration phase and then look on Google Maps at the crucial moment before decision making.

content.title: Improve your reputation faster
content.desc: Most buyers are more reticient at purchasing from local stores which profile is incomplete or lack photos of the establishment.

content.title: Capitalize on local buyers' intent
content.desc: Display valuable and up to date information about you is provided to local buyers when looking to purchase in their area.

content.title: Generate customer interest easily
content.desc: Before turning to local buying, 9 out of 10 customers will start on a search engine. 7 of them think that its primardial for opening hours to be easily discoverable.

sections.title: Become {{- open}}more{{- close}} close to your clients

content.title: quality
content.desc: Your image is your best asset. Our objective is to present it under its best light.

content.title: results
content.desc: Listings with photos and a virtual tour are twice as likely to entice interest online.

content.title: trust
content.desc: Profit of the expertise from a canadian agency certified by Google for its virtual imagery.

sections.title: Our realizations
sections.desc: We've had the opportunity to work with local businesses of diverse sizes to help them enhance the efficiency of their listings. Whatever may be your industry, your company will benefit from an increased online presence following the publication of a virtual tour on your profile.
